attributes.action: Members of parliament to have the same terms and conditions as civil servants
attributes.additional_details: All of our members of parliament should live exactly as others do.For example their terms and conditions of employment should be the same as other state employees. as regard to both their pension entitlement and working hours.It is not acceptable in a capitalist democracy that our representatives are doing work for companies in hours that we the tax payers are employing them to represent us.
